data.Name: The Hip Abduction
data.Bio: The Hip Abduction is a Florida-based 7-piece band that mixes African traditions, rock, and reggae vibes to create their own unique sound. With heavy emphasis placed on dub-reggae-inspired bass lines, funky afro beat percussion, and a 2 piece horn section, concerts never fail to turn into a nonstop dance party. The fact that the band has played and resided all over the world helps merge traditional music with original ideas to make a powerful songwriting machine. Read more on Last.fm
